message.content: Set of the intervals defining the graph whose maximum independent set we want to compute.
The matrix of the right extremes has been computed.
The right extremes have been ordered.
A new right extreme (colored in green) is analyzed: the extreme corresponds to the azure interval.
The azure interval begins after the end of the yellow one (if any): then, this interval can be included in the independent set.
The yellow interval has been included as the last one in the independent set together with the other red intervals (if any).
A new right extreme (colored in green) is analyzed: the extreme corresponds to the azure interval.
The azure interval begins before the end of the yellow one: then, this interval cannot be included in the independent set.
The red intervals (if any) and the yellow one are included in the independent set, while the gray ones (if any) are not included in the independent set.

The maximum independent set has been computed and includes the red intervals.
